articles.title: We've Found the Coolest, Most Futuristic Tech at CES 2026. And the Show Just Started - CNET
articles.description: We've already had a day to trawl for our favorite cutting-edge technology. Neat stuff abounds!
articles.content: Solid state batteries use a solid material to pass ions between the nodes of a battery, compared to the liquid electrolyte used by, say, alkaline and lithium batteries. The solid chemistry allows the… [+639 chars]
